channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 2nd October
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure footway cracks and gaps 3010x410x45mm tarmac patch required stats required (FW6 Cracks or Gaps)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree needs cutting back, 2nd October
item.description:
Tree branches are impacting the overhead broadband cables, particularly in high winds, th branches and leaves are impacting the street light next to the tree. Branches are also impacting pedestrians trying to walk down footpath as are now low hanging This has been requested before but no action taken
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Dorset Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light out, 1st October
item.description:

item.title: Numerous pot holes and surface cracks along bike wheel line, 1st October
item.description:
The carriageway heading west from the racecourse roundabout to the mini roundabout at Tommy Taylors Lane. Numerous potholes, cracking and sunken chambers along this length, all are within the wheel line for cyclists using this route, so it presents a serious danger to cyclists.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Swindon Lane, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st October
item.description:

item.title: Drainage ditch/channel adjacent/ parallel to Pittville School playing field is blocked by caved in large stone blocks where the banks have collapsed. Just before it enters Wymans Brook. Potential flooding problem on Albert Road. Please note extensive drainage works on Pittville School playing field will exacerbate future drainage issues., 1st October
item.description:
Opposite (east) side of road to 82 Albert Road. Just north of Wymans Brook road bridge east side. Just observed but must have occurred before today. Very important this drainage ditch is kept clear as sports field next to it will need somewhere for water run off when new Sports field is re-laid with pitches and running track.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 1st October
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 1st October
item.description:
